import React from "react"; import "./FeaturedProducts.css"; import { ShoppingCart, Heart, Zap } from "lucide-react"; const products = [ { id: 1, name: "LED Bulb 12W", price: 450, description: "Energy-efficient, long-lasting LED bulb", discount: 15, }, { id: 2, name: "Circuit Breaker", price: 1250, description: "High-quality safety circuit breaker", discount: 0, }, { id: 3, name: "Extension Cord 5m", price: 850, description: "Heavy-duty 5-meter extension cord", discount: 10, }, { id: 4, name: "Smart Switch", price: 2100, description: "WiFi-enabled smart wall switch", discount: 0, }, { id: 5, name: "Ceiling Fan", price: 4500, description: "Energy-efficient ceiling fan with remote", discount: 20, }, { id: 6, name: "Power Strip 6-Way", price: 1100, description: "Surge-protected 6-outlet power strip", discount: 0, }, ]; export function FeaturedProducts() { return (

)}
